attributes.name: data-zui-note-timeout
attributes.description: When this attribute is set, it will close the note after the given timeout. The value is in milliseconds.

attributes.name: data-zui-note-fade-speed
attributes.description: When the data-zui-note-fade-speed attribute is set, it will be used as the fadeout speed. The value is in milliseconds.

attributes.name: data-zui-note-selector
attributes.description: The selector of the element to which the note should be bound.

attributes.name: data-zui-note-offset-x
attributes.description: An additional horizontal offset to add to the note.

attributes.name: data-zui-note-offset-y
attributes.description: An additional vertical offset to add to the note.

classes.name: zui-note
classes.description: The zui-note class identifies an HTML element as a note.

classes.name: zui-note-title
classes.description: The zui-note-title class identifies an HTML element as the title part of a note.

classes.name: zui-note-content
classes.description: The zui-note-content class identifies an HTML that contains the content of a note.

events.name: zui-note-closed
events.description: The event that is triggered once a note is closed.
